reviewText: Movie was exactly what i wanted. Shipping and packaging was excellent it took me awhile to get my package open. Item arrived very quickly. Excellent price for the series,cheapest that i have found. I would definitely order from this seller again in the future.

This was my first Korean Drama -- I'm so glad I found it!

I saw it on TV by mistake one night (started with Episode 3) and after that, I was hooked! It only took another episode before I was looking for the DVDs, all of which I watched nearly in a row, one right after another. It really is wonderful, even if you're not into romance or cheesy things (which I'm not so much), the humor is amazing, and the story line is great. It is my guilty pleasure.

I highly recommend this if you haven't gotten into Korean Dramas yet, it's perfect for someone just starting out with them like I was. And if you already have, give this set a try! It's my favorite so far for sure.

I watched this series on TV, and found it totally delightful, well worth five stars. However, when purchasing the series on DVD, I (at the risk of sounding like a shill for Amazon) caution the buyer to purchase the more expensive version, pictured in the Amazon listing's first image. This is the region 1 edition. The other, cheaper versions listed are Chinese, all-region imports, with English subtitles that are nearly indecipherable, and riddled with mispellings and words that make absolutely no sense. This is the second image shown; you can see the Chinese text on the packaging. Playability is also poor. Get the quality version, and you'll find it well worth the price.

We aren't Korean but love Korean soaps.

We were fortunate enough to catch this a couple episodes in when it started. Great acting! Comes through in spite of the language barrier. Every Thursday in Chicago @ 910-1010pmcst we are hooked to see what's coming next.

Thank God for subtitles!

We will be buying it for our home library. Worth watching over again.
i am a ahn jay wook fan and i try to buy every movie he is in. i enjoyed this one very much.have watched it 3 times already.

Great item, fast shipping.
True love stories from the heart.

Might have made a good story if not so hard core, unnecessarily so I think and then more of the same in similar titles.  Colourful and sometimes humorous but far too much detail of graphic sexual bits. Not very sexy in my opinion.

This title contains nudity and mature situations.  For ages 18+.

I've seen better animation in Sekerie or Heaven's Lost Property, but this is still decent.  The girls looked cute and the Japanese voice acting was good.  I've looked for a decent "adult title" that wasn't creepy or weird for some time, but they're hard to find.  I don't enjoy all the weird fetishes, domination, or creepy rape scenes that seem to dominate so many adult animation titles.  (don't buy Blood Royale unless you're a creepy Rapist jerk)  This title was a charming love affair between the main characters with a few other interested female characters competing for attention.  It was something normal and nice.

While this wasn't spectacular, it is so much better than a lot of the weird garbage out there, it rates 4 stars.  If the animation was a little better and the "show" had a few more episodes, this could easily be 5 stars.

I have purchased 8 or 9 critical mass vides and have been disappointed by every one of them, I will not purchase another. The story is good but the anime is flat and has a comic book appearance without the color.
the movie was poor quality and the content was boring to say the least would not recommend you get what you pay for

I agree with many reviewers that the animation in this show was rather bad, but that has been way overrated.  The story was good and it didn't have men torturing or degrading women.
 Instead of the wide spread hatred against women displayed in most pornography here we have a guy looking for a fulfilling, personal and lasting relation, a relations of benefit for he himself and his couple. Now, both searching for a couple and a serious relation definitively involve sex.
I also appreciated the fact that the women after the central guy didn't cling unto him but quickly realized the situation and went ahead with their lives.
